channel.title: Please help me!
channel.description: ok. Me and my frend are local hosts of our server were at the same house and same ip. yet wen he trys to connect he cant but i can connect with 2 accs on my labtop he's tryed our server ip and local host 0.0.0.0 please help us

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

it is lol people are already playing on my server.
he just cant connect ill see if this works[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2009, 07:47:47 pm[/size][hr][quote=“str by zammy, post:2, topic:291151”]Cmd > Ipconfig

Your friend has to use your Default Gateway ip to connect.[/quote]
That didnt work were sittin right next 2 eachother on 2 different comps

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me!

Cmd > Ipconfig

Your friend has to use your Default Gateway ip to connect.
